history.narrative: Law 2-140 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-294, which was referred to the Committee on Employment and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first, amended first, second amended first, and second readings on September 19, 1978, October 3, 1978, October 17, 1978 and October 31, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 27, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-301 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
